=== About Ohio Linux Fest 2009 ===

Date: Saturday, September 26, 2009

Place: Greater Columbus Convention Center, in downtown Columbus, Ohio.

For more information, visit <nowiki>[[http://www.ohiolinux.org|www.ohiolinux.org]]</nowiki>.

==== Things to have at the booth ====

Have something you'd like to bring? Add it!

* Power strip & ext cord
* Scissors
* CDs, pens, stickers, etc (zerhacke)
* Two Ubuntu books
* Demo laptops from System76

=== Volunteers ===

We need volunteers to man the Ubuntu booth at OLF. If you would like to volunteer, please add your name here, and at a later date we will organize times & shifts.
